video.title: Chuck
video.synopsis: When underachieving computer geek Chuck Bartowski accidentally downloads a classified data app into his brain, he suddenly becomes a government asset.

episodes.synopsis: Computer geek Chuck Bartowski becomes the government's most vital spy after unwittingly downloading sensitive, top-secret data into his brain.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: As Chuck continues to come to grips with his new life as a spy, tension builds between his recently appointed partners, Sarah and Casey.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Helicopter

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is learning that living two lives isn't going to be easy. Meanwhile, Sarah and Casey force Chuck to go undercover on his first spy mission.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Tango

episodes.synopsis: Chuck takes on an unusual task when Sarah's CIA colleague needs help with a mission involving a million-dollar diamond being used to fund terrorists.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Wookiee

episodes.synopsis: Chuck faces his first moral dilemma as a spy: He must either go against the U.S. government and his friends or do what he believes is right.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Sizzling Shrimp

episodes.synopsis: After meeting a fellow agent leading a similar double life, Chuck must decide whether to turn him in to Sarah and Casey or help him escape.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Sandworm

episodes.synopsis: When he returns to Stanford University to help a professor, Chuck learns the shocking truth about his former friend Bryce Larkin.
episodes.title: Chuck versus the Alma Mater

episodes.synopsis: Chuck tussles with a poison specialist who's trying to obtain codes to nuclear facilities by using a "truth" potion.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Truth

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck starts dating Lou, a sandwich maker, it sparks jealousy in Sarah, who discovers that her feelings may not have been part of a cover story.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Imported Hard Salami

episodes.synopsis: Bryce returns after being presumed dead -- and to prove to Sarah, Casey and the rest of the CIA that he hasn't gone rogue, he needs Chuck's help.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Nemesis

episodes.synopsis: Chuck poses as Sarah's hubby to foil a politically connected counterfeiter and yachtsman. Meanwhile, it's time for the annual Buy More holiday party.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Crown Vic

episodes.synopsis: When several Russian arms dealers meet secretly in Los Angeles, Chuck discovers that one Russian woman may be Casey's ex-girlfriend.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Undercover Lover

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Awesome asks Chuck for Ellie's hand in marriage and then insists that Chuck hold onto the ring -- which is promptly stolen.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Marlin

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is told that his spy career is over and he can begin a normal life. Free from bullets and bombs, Chuck asks Sarah out on a real first date.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the First Date

episodes.synopsis: Chuck must go undercover to retrieve the Cipher from the sultry but dangerous spy known as the Black Widow.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Seduction

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is overcome with jealousy when his nemesis -- and Sarah's ex-lover and former partner -- Bryce Larkin makes an unexpected return.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Break-Up

episodes.synopsis: Chuck learns more about Sarah's past when they run into her old high school nemesis, Heather Chandler.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Cougars

episodes.synopsis: After a global terrorist comes searching for Jeff, Chuck is forced to socialize with Jeff to find out what role the oddball plays in the mission.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Tom Sawyer

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck flashes on his ex-girlfriend Jill's boss -- a scientist who may have developed a deadly bio weapon -- he must find out if Jill is involved.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Ex

episodes.synopsis: Jealousy erupts when Jill finally meets Sarah and learns that Chuck and his handler must pose as a couple.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Fat Lady

episodes.synopsis: Chuck discovers that Jill is a Fulcrum agent. In the wake of his disbelief, Chuck is asked to use his relationship with Jill to get to an agent.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Gravitron

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is still reeling from the discovery that his ex-girlfriend was a Fulcrum agent and goes on a mission to take his mind off his shock.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Sensei

episodes.synopsis: Chuck sees Sarah on a date with an older man. Chuck tries to warn Sarah after he has an Intersect flash, but she assures him that she's not in danger.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the DeLorean

episodes.synopsis: When a car crashes into the Buy More and everyone is held hostage by the car's driver, including Awesome and Ellie, true colors begin to show.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Santa Claus

episodes.synopsis: In this 3-D episode, when Chuck foils a plan to kill an international rock star, the agents kidnap the musician to find out who wants him dead.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Third Dimension

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah's latest assignment forces them to pose as a happily married couple living in the suburbs.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Suburbs

episodes.synopsis: Chuck helps a heartbroken Morgan spy on Anna, but after he flashes on Anna's new beau, he's sent to discover the guy's connection to a dangerous gang.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Chuck breaks up with Sarah at Ellie's urging, but jealousy strikes when Sarah must seduce a handsome agent in order to retrieve Fulcrum intelligence.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Beefcake

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah and Casey learn about a man called Perseus who is behind Fulcrum's plans to build its own Intersect.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Lethal Weapon

episodes.synopsis: Chuck must decide who he can trust: Sarah and Casey or the mysterious scientist who might be able to erase the Intersect from his mind.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Predator

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck expresses his feelings about his relationship with Sarah, a female agent is sent to evaluate Sarah's performance as Chuck's handler.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Broken Heart

episodes.synopsis: Chuck's life seems to be coming together. His long-absent father, Steve, has returned and he's landed his dream job with his hero, Ted Roark.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Dream Job

episodes.synopsis: After Chuck's father is kidnapped by Fulcrum, Chuck learns the only chance he has to find him is by putting his trust in his ex-girlfriend Jill.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the First Kill

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck and Sarah go AWOL to rescue Chuck's father, they find that spending time together without surveillance allows for unchartered chemistry.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Colonel

episodes.synopsis: When Ellie and Awesome's wedding day finally arrives, Chuck must save Ellie's life and her big day from being ruined by Ted Roark.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Now that Chuck has new abilities, he trains to become a full-fledged spy -- but when he flunks out of spy school and loses Sarah, he hits rock bottom.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Pink Slip

episodes.synopsis: When Sarah's best friend comes through town with her fiancé, Chuck wants to hash out his and Sarah's relationship problems while he's on a mission.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Three Words

episodes.synopsis: Though Chuck tries to always protect his family from his spy life, he can't stop Ellie and Awesome from stumbling into an international incident.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Angel de la Muerte

episodes.synopsis: When Awesome is mistaken for a spy, Chuck must become Awesome's handler and show him the ropes. While on a mission for the Ring, they meet Shaw.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Operation Awesome

episodes.synopsis: Shaw assigns Chuck to his first solo mission, ignoring Sarah and Casey's wishes. Meanwhile, Casey helps Morgan battle for control of Buy More.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus First Class

episodes.synopsis: Chuck juggles his double life as he trains a new Nerd Herder and gets his own asset. Meanwhile, Awesome must lie to Ellie when she asks about Chuck.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Nacho Sampler

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Hannah become part of agent Shaw's latest mission. Sarah gets paired with Shaw, who seems to be trying to get close to her.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Mask

episodes.synopsis: Chuck promises to cook for Hannah, Ellie and Awesome, but first, on a mission, he must assume the identity of the world's most dangerous assassin.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Fake Name

episodes.synopsis: Chuck can't flash and gets left behind on a mission. While Shaw, Sarah and Casey go on without him, Chuck finds himself in a sticky situation.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Beard

episodes.synopsis: Casey carries out a side mission for his old commanding officer, but it leads to Casey committing treason. Chuck and Sarah try to clear Casey's name.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Tic Tac

episodes.synopsis: Chuck learns that his latest mission will be a final test to see if he is ready to be a spy. Chuck needs to put everything he has learned into action.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Final Exam

episodes.synopsis: Chuck can pick any agent for an undercover operation, but he has only one girl in mind: Sarah. The gang teams up to help Chuck win her back.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the American Hero

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah and Shaw reunite to find the Ring operative behind the death of Shaw's wife. Chuck is worried about Shaw's emotional stability.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Other Guy

episodes.synopsis: While in Europe, Sarah and Chuck realize they're on a train with Spanish spies. Even though they're alone, they decide to take on the rogue agents.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Honeymooners

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah are assigned to train under Craig and Laura Turner, a married CIA team who, despite their impeccable record, hate each other.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Role Models

episodes.synopsis: Chuck believes a dream predicts danger for a visiting head of state. Gen. Beckman is unconvinced and assigns Chuck to meet with a CIA psychiatrist.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Tooth

episodes.synopsis: After his last dream, Chuck asks Morgan to help him on a side mission. Their investigation becomes complicated when Chuck's dad, Stephen, returns.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Living Dead

episodes.synopsis: The Ring is closing in on Operation Bartowski. Fortunately, Chuck's dad is working hard to save his son. Meanwhile, Casey must protect his daughter.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Subway

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah and the team plan to expose Shaw and the Ring Elders' plans. Meanwhile, trouble brews at Buy More.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Ring: Part II

episodes.synopsis: In the season premiere, Chuck and Morgan go on a rogue, globe-spanning mission to find Chuck's mom. Back home, Ellie delivers big news to her family.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: To recover a high-tech secret weapon, Chuck and Sarah head to Milan, Italy, for fashion week. Elsewhere, Casey struggles to put down roots in Burbank.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Suitcase

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah's romantic mission is cancelled upon the arrival of their archenemies Hugo Panzer and Heather Chandler.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Cubic Z

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah work on becoming better communicators as they join Awesome and Ellie for a getaway to Costa Gravas, where the gang reunites with Goya.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Coup d'Etat

episodes.synopsis: When Col. Casey's former team returns to look for him, Chuck must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to find his mother.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Couch Lock

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah, Casey and Morgan are tasked with stopping evil scientist Stanley Wheelright from releasing a nightmare-inducing toxin.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Aisle of Terror

episodes.synopsis: After their first fight, Chuck avoids confronting Sarah by embarking on a rogue mission that leads him to his mom's MI6 handler and a Russian agent.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the First Fight

episodes.synopsis: Afraid that his latest setback is causing a rift between him and Sarah, Chuck tries to prove himself by embarking on a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Fear of Death

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah, Casey and Morgan venture into the jungles of Southeast Asia when an international spy attempts to unravel the secrets of the Intersect.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Phase Three

episodes.synopsis: It's the day after Thanksgiving, and Chuck faces the most awkward of family reunions when his mother comes over for dinner.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Leftovers

episodes.synopsis: When an assignment takes Chuck to a French vineyard, he attempts to track a nano-chip while also creating the perfect romantic getaway for Sarah.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Balcony

episodes.synopsis: Chuck worries that Sarah may be getting in too deep when she takes dangerous measures to help Mary Bartowski bring down Alexei Volkoff.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Gobbler

episodes.synopsis: As Sarah works to free Chuck's mother, he and Morgan embark on a risky mission to take down Alexei Volkoff. Meanwhile, Casey bonds with his daughter.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Push Mix

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Sarah and Casey are dispatched to Morocco to rescue debonair agent Roan Montgomery. Back at home, Morgan prepares to meet Alex's mother.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Seduction Impossible

episodes.synopsis: Chuck surprises Sarah by reuniting her with her former spy team, the C.A.T. Squad, leading to a mission in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Cat Squad

episodes.synopsis: A romantic Valentine's Day is interrupted when Chuck and the team are sent to England on a mission to protect a reclusive young heiress.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Chuck prods Vivian to get in touch with her inner villain for a mission. Elsewhere, Sarah gets in touch with her inner bride as wedding plans ramp up.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the First Bank of Evil

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah investigate when they suspect that Casey is carrying out secret missions. Elsewhere, Morgan settles in with a new roommate.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the A-Team

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is put in charge of a key mission, but his leadership skills are tested when there's a murder in Castle and it's up to him to find the culprit.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Muuurder

episodes.synopsis: A bad day gets worse when Sarah throws Chuck a relationship curveball. Meanwhile, the CIA orders the assassination of Vivian McArthur Volkoff.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Family Volkoff

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck and Sarah get conned out of their wedding money, there's only one man they can turn to for help: Sarah's con artist father, Jack Burton.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Wedding Planner

episodes.synopsis: Chuck puts aside spy work for a weekend of debauchery, but his bachelor party doesn't go as planned after some uninvited guests arrive.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Agent X

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah's wedding preparation includes one final detail: ensuring that the groom's mother makes it to the ceremony alive.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Last Details

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Chuck must enlist help from his wedding party to take down Vivian Volkoff and stop her from destroying the big day.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Cliffhanger

episodes.synopsis: Carmichael Industries takes on a slick, rich thief and a conniving investor who's stolen money from some of the world's most dangerous people.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Zoom

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and company struggle to establish themselves as Carmichael Industries in the face of a rival security firm led by Gertrude Verbanski.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Bearded Bandit

episodes.synopsis: The team is tasked with finding one of the CIA's "most wanted." Elsewhere, Captain Awesome makes a startling revelation about Jeff and Lester.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Frosted Tips

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah go undercover at a Buy More convention to hunt down an assassin who's tasked with taking down the new Intersect.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Business Trip

episodes.synopsis: A mission to track down a computer super virus leads Chuck to return to his roots as a hacker -- and to call on his biggest competition.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Hack Off

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah race against time to take down a dangerous computer virus, pitting them against a ruthless spy who will stop at nothing.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Curse

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Sarah discover who's really behind the plot to destroy Carmichael Industries. Ellie's plans for a perfect Christmas begin to come apart.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Santa Suit

episodes.synopsis: When Sarah is forced to confront a secret from her past, she feels she must do so alone. But Chuck really wants her to let him help.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Baby

episodes.synopsis: Casey's forbidden love, Gertrude Verbanski, walks back into his life with a questionable mission in South Beach.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Kept Man

episodes.synopsis: As Chuck and Sarah try to realize a new, safer future, Morgan's past as the Intersect sends them to Vail on one last mission.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Bo

episodes.synopsis: When a mission in Japan morphs into a hostage situation, Sarah and Chuck must face the merciless Nicholas Quinn aboard a speeding bullet train.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Bullet Train

episodes.synopsis: After a harrowing mission, Sarah has a huge secret for Chuck. Meanwhile, Ellie and Awesome get the opportunity of a lifetime.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus Sarah

episodes.synopsis: Chuck enlists his family, friends and some unexpected allies in a race to stop Nicholas Quinn from destroying everything he's built.
episodes.title: Chuck Versus the Goodbye
